title: Last Plant On Earth
description: Last Plant On Earth is a sci-fi game where you play as a robot controlled by the last living plant. The robot uprising brought about the downfall of all life on Earth, leaving behind a desolate wasteland. Your mission is to plant and protect as many trees as possible and breathe life back into the barren land. But be warned as the shadows are teeming with robot enemies, ready to strike at any moment.
